description:
With the Spotify app, you can explore an extensive library of music and podcasts for free. Curate the best playlists and stream millions of free songs, albums and original podcasts on your mobile or tablet. Subscribe to Spotify Premium to download and listen offline wherever you are, and unlock our catalogue of audiobooks.

Why choose Spotify as your go-to music and podcast app? Here, you can:
• Listen to over 100 million songs and 6 million podcast titles
• Explore our selection of specially-crafted artist playlists
• Easily search for your favourite songs, albums, artists and podcasts
• Discover personalised music recommendations tailored to your unique taste
• Subscribe to your favourite free podcasts so you never miss an episode and even curate your own podcast library

Spotify Free is more than a music player – find the sounds that you love and stream music and podcasts online for free. Enjoy personalised playlists or curate and share your own, discover the hottest new releases, explore upcoming events from your favourites and more.

• Stream millions of free songs and podcasts
• Create playlists with your favourite music
• Share songs and playlists with friends and family (feature restrictions may apply in some regions)
• Discover personalised playlists made just for you, and collaborate on playlists with your friends
• Enjoy your personal Discover Weekly playlist every week
• Stay in the know with the Release Radar and New Music Friday playlists
• Find nearby events and gigs by your favourite artists
• See your most played songs, genres, artists and more with yearly Spotify Wrapped
• Stream music across your devices with Spotify
• Use Spotify Connect and enjoy listening on smart speakers, desktop, laptop, smart TV, Chromecast, PlayStation®, Xbox®, smartwatch, in your car and more – limited number of device models apply

Spotify Premium – a great way to enjoy the benefits of an offline music player and stream music without Wi-Fi. By pressing download, you can access your songs, playlists, podcasts and audiobooks offline, wherever you are.
• Listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks – all in one place
• Ad-free music listening: enjoy your music with no ad interruptions
• Enjoy full on-demand playback
• Audiobooks in Premium are currently available in the UK, US, Australia, Ireland, New Zealand and Canada. Discover 250,000+ audiobook titles with 15 hours/month of available listening for Premium Individual subscribers and Duo & Family plan managers.
• Superior sound quality on supported devices
• AI DJ: a personalised guide that knows your music taste so well that it can choose what to play for you
• Enjoy on desktop, mobile phone, tablet, computer, smartwatch and in your car
• Listen and control the listening session together by hosting a Jam in real time with friends
• Download songs, podcasts and audiobooks for offline listening without an Internet connection
• No contract required – cancel your subscription whenever you want

Spotify lets you play music wherever you are. Listen to your favourite songs and discover new music, podcasts and audiobooks with the Spotify app!

LOVE SPOTIFY?
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spotify
Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@spotify

What's that song? Shazam will instantly identify music playing around you or in apps like TikTok, Instagram, YouTube & Snapchat. Discover concerts near you, song lyrics, videos & more. With tens of millions of daily users, Shazam is trusted by music lovers worldwide.

“Shazam is a gift... a game changer” – Pharrell Williams, GQ 
“I don't know how we ever survived before Shazam” – Marshmello 
“Shazam is a kind of magic… You hear a song, hold your phone up like a wand and it tells you exactly what song it is, who sang it and lets you add it to your playlist or share it to your social media… How is that not magic?!” – Calum Scott

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT

* Identify music in an instant.
* Discover live shows near you from your favourite artists or through curated recommendations.
* Recognise songs even when you’re offline, using headphones or on a different app.
* Revisit your music discovery history in your library anytime.
* Get recommended songs and playlists similar to the music you’ve discovered.

USE SHAZAM ANYWHERE, ANYTIME

* Enable the Shazam widgets on your Lock Screen or Home Screen.
* Ask Siri, “What’s this song?” to use Shazam hands-free.
* Automate music discovery with the Shazam Shortcut in the Shortcuts app.

CONNECT WITH YOUR MUSIC

* Unlock extras from artists around the world.
* Open any song directly in Apple Music, Spotify, YouTube Music, Amazon Music & Deezer.
* Listen and add songs directly to your Apple Music playlists.
* Watch music videos of the songs you discover in Apple Music or YouTube.
* Follow along to songs with real-time, karaoke-style lyrics.
* See what’s trending locally and globally with Shazam Charts.

Availability and features may vary by country. For more information on Shazam’s privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/. Find out more and get support from AppleCare at https://support.apple.com/guide/shazam/welcome.

Amplify your imagination. Powered by the world’s most advanced AI music model, Suno transforms your ideas into songs—no instruments needed, just your creative vision. Whether you’re a shower-singer, aspiring songwriter, or charting artist, Suno empowers you to create and discover music like never before.

Generate music from prompts, images, or videos with the world’s best AI music model:
• Transform your ideas into fully-produced songs and beats with a single prompt. Create 10 songs or beats per day at no cost.
• Inspiration begins with you. Write a text prompt like "Create a rap song about walking my dog," sing a melody, hum a tune, or tap out a beat.
• Record or upload audio to personalize your music, or generate songs from images and videos.

Write original lyrics with effortlessly:
• Whether you're in your feels with emotional ballads, hyped on energetic rap verses, or hooked on catchy pop, our lyrics generator and AI songwriter helps you craft custom lyrics that match your style and creative vision.

Create playlists for every mood and moment:
• Curate your personal AI music library and organize your favorite tracks, beats, and instrumentals into playlists you can revisit anytime.
• Manage your AI songs, view track details, and fine-tune your playlists—your music making journey is uniquely yours with Suno.

Discover new music and connect with artists:
• Stay inspired by listening to tracks created by other users and explore the best AI music across genres like rock, rap, hip hop, pop, and more.
• Find fresh favorites by browsing trending music and follow artists to stay connected.
• Discover new voice styles, AI covers, rising talent, and beat makers from around the world.

Music has no boundaries at Suno. Anything you imagine can take shape as a song to share. Whether you're taking your first steps in music making or chasing your next hit, infinite possibilities begin with a simple prompt in our AI song generator. Feeling pro? Take full creative control: adjust vocals, tweak structure, fine-tune melodies, and edit every detail to your vision.

Suno is how imagination becomes music, and music becomes yours.

app_name: Beat Maker Pro - DJ Drum Pad
description:
Are you looking for the ultimate beat-making trainer? Look no further and choose Beat Maker Pro.

Beat Maker Pro will boost your rhythm skills through guided beat-making lessons, whether you are a beginner or an advanced musician. If you wonder… YES, beat-making is for everyone!

Beat Maker Pro is your ideal music coach that will guide you through beat composition in no time.

Play your first song in three lessons, then improve with our skill-building exercises, challenge yourself and keep making beats!

Enjoy our regularly updated world-class catalogue, including famous tracks and sample packs made by professional beat-makers. 

Features:

- Train to play pads with over 1000 lessons and unique sound packs
- Learn tips and tricks conceived by experienced beat makers
- Master all music styles: EDM, trap, house, pop, electro…and more
- Tap and Learn: intuitive drum pads
- Creative finger drumming. Use drums, piano, and FX
- Share your music and beat productions with the world!
- Challenge yourself in our career mode and earn Superstar status!

Premium benefits:

The premium subscription allows you to access all the present and upcoming Premium features and remove all ads from your experience. It also gives you access to exclusive sample packs in our catalogue all regularly uploaded sample packs.



Privacy Policy & Terms of Service: http://musicworldmedia.com/products/drum-pad/tos

Discover Music & Playlists with Audiomack – Stream & Download Offline

Audiomack is a music player and discovery app that lets you stream and download the hottest songs, mixtapes, albums, and playlists.

On the Audiomack free tier, listen and download songs and albums with no subscription needed. Play full songs and albums with unlimited skips and repeats, even in the background while using other apps. You can even make your own playlists, and stream and share them, all for free.

Whether you're into hip-hop, Afrobeats, R&B, amapiano, Latin, reggae, dancehall, pop, rock, or country, Audiomack helps you discover music and rising artists faster than ever.

Audiomack Free features:
- Stream music with full control: Play full tracks with unlimited skips. Build playlists, repeat your favorite songs, and listen the way you want, free.
- Listen offline, no wifi needed: Download music and mixtapes to your phone and play them anytime, even without data.
- Remix your songs with Audiomod: Customize playback with pitch control, speed adjustment, reverb effects, and presets like Nightcore, Sped Up, Daycore, Slow and Reverb, and more.
- Personalized Music Recommendations: Get new music picked just for you.
- Top charts and trending music: Explore what’s hot locally and globally - see what’s trending on our top music charts.
- Connect with artists: Follow your favorite artists and be the first to hear new releases and exclusive messages.

Audiomack+ (monthly subscription) features:
- No Ads: enjoy your music with no interruptions
- Premium listening experience: equalizer, hifi listening
- Premium mods: get access to more Audiomod presets

Thank you for choosing our Offline Music Player.
We are about to soar through the world of music, playing your songs anywhere.
No limits! No limits! No limits!

Free Music Library Management
The offline music player supports smart grouping by songs, albums, and artists.
Use our free offline music player to search songs, albums, or discover popular new artists from around the world.

Powerful Offline Music Player
Supports background playback in full-screen or mini mode.
The MP3 player also supports lock screen controls, widgets, driving mode, headset controls, and sleep timer.

Supports Popular Formats
Play music without needing to convert formats.
Our music player is not just an MP3 player; it also plays MP3, AAC, WAV, FLAC, ALAC, M4A, and more.

Offline Music Player Widgets
Our free music app comes with interactive widgets in various sizes, supporting song switching and quick playlist playback.
So you can enjoy music on your home screen or standby mode.

Custom Music Scenes
To better fit your environment — whether it’s a square, church, street, or library —
we provide professional scenes to suit the music you play.
Of course, you can also adjust according to your own preferences.

Custom Music Equalizer
To personalize your sound, the built-in equalizer in our music app offers many advanced audio features,
such as music genre presets, custom equalizer, reverb adjustment, audio amplifier, and bass boost.

Offline Music Editing
The offline player can read ID3 tags and batch edit album art and songs.

Create and Manage Playlists
You can create playlists and personalized music categories for various scenes using our free offline music player.

Cooler Skins
Change your skin, change your mood.
We offer packs like Rock Red, Glacier Blue, Premium White, and also support logo, theme color, and background changes.
You can also customize based on your mood.

Try our free music app to enjoy music your way without Wi-Fi.
As one of the best offline music apps, it’s the best source for unlimited listening time.
A must-have iPhone music player.

---

Subscription Information

Without subscription, you are in trial mode:
• Limit on number of imported songs.
• Limit on ringtone creation.
• Limit on equalizer usage.
• Limits on audio clipping, merging, converting, and playback speed.
• Limits on scheduled play and auto shutdown.
• Limits on driving mode.
• Limits on themes and skins.

With subscription, you get:
• Unlimited access to songs and playlists.
• Ringtone clipping to make it cooler.
• Optimized scenes for church, library, street, or noisy places.
• Lyrics creation for learning or songwriting.
• Equalizer perfect for passionate music lovers.
• Special features like audio clipping, merging, converting, and speed control.
• Scheduled play and auto shutdown.
• Exclusive themes and driving mode for the unique you.

---

Offline Music Player is the ultimate app for playing your local music collection offline, now enhanced with online high-definition music streaming. It supports various audio formats, smart playlists, and an advanced equalizer for a personalized listening experience. You can easily transfer tracks to your iPhone or iPad, and import music from local storage or cloud services.
Three Core Ways to Enjoy Media:
Offline Music Playback: Enjoy your personal music library anywhere, without an internet connection.
Online HD Music Video Streaming: Stream high-definition music videos on demand via YouTube.
In additional, you can listen to the most popular music radio stations. There are over 100,000 fm radio stations from 200 countries and regions. 

Key Features:

• Support multiple popular audio formats
Enjoy a smooth music playback experience without converting formats. Offline Music Player is not just an MP3 player, it also supports multiple formats including MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, 3GP, OGG, M4A, WMA, PCM, etc.

• Multiple import methods
Offline music player provides multiple import methods, including file import, Wi-Fi transfer, photos import, Apple music, GoogleDrive, DropBox, Box, OneDrive, etc. These options allow you to easily transfer music and enjoy offline MP3 music.

• Advanced Audio Equalizer
Customize your sound with built-in 5-band equalizer, reverb effects, and bass boost. Offline music player lets you play every song the way you want it.

• Sleep Timer
Offline music player can set a timer, and the music will automatically stop playing when the time is up. Very suitable for listening to music before going to bed.

• Quick sort and global search
Sort songs by name, duration, file size, album or artist. Offline music player provides global search function, you can quickly find any track.

• Powerful Tag Editor
Edit song title, artist name, album cover, release date, music genre and more. Offline music player provides a truly personalized listening experience.

• Stylish themes and skins
Various built-in themes and player skins for you to choose from. The interface of the offline music player is simple and elegant and can be fully customized.

• Headphone and Bluetooth Compatible
Offline music player seamlessly supports wired and Bluetooth headphones, with smooth switching and clear sound quality.

What you need is a reliable offline music player. With our music app, you can enjoy music wherever you want, even without Wi-Fi, and experience unlimited listening with the perfect offline music player for your iPhone or iPad.

description:
My Vibe is an endless stream of personalized music that instantly adapts to your likes and dislikes. Just tap a button, sit back, and let great new music find you.
Millions of Tracks in a Single App.

• No ads with Yandex Plus
• Lossless format audio
• Your own collection of tracks
• Music, audiobooks, and podcasts, available online and offline
• Music recognition
• Lyrics displayed on your player screen
• Personal recommendations
• Music collections transferred from other services
• Editor's selections of music
• Popular and new albums and singles
• Yandex Plus: Yandex Music, Kinopoisk, and bonus points

Recognize Music
Identify the song playing in the background by tapping the magnifying glass icon and then tapping "Recognize Music." Let Yandex Music listen, and the app will tell you the song's name and save it to a special playlist called "Recognized."

Books and Podcasts on Any Topic
Go beyond music: enjoy your favorite audiobooks and discover podcasts on any topic with the Yandex Music app. Podcasts are an excellent way to learn something new and useful every day! Listen at your preferred pace, and if you need to stop, the app will remember your place, so you can resume later.

Build Your Collection
Add tracks you like on Yandex Music to your media library. Import tracks from your phone and listen to them anytime, either in the iPhone app or on the website.

Listen Offline
Save tracks and playlists in the app for offline listening, even without an internet connection. When offline mode is enabled, the app displays only the music saved on your iPhone.

Plus to Music
Yandex Plus grants access to music and podcasts in Yandex Music, books, movies and series on Kinopoisk, and bonus points in other Yandex services. Discover the benefits at plus.yandex.ru.
The music catalog may not be available in some countries. Learn more at yandex.ru/legal/yandex_plus_privilege_list/
Upon confirming your purchase, payment will be made from your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is disabled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Renewal will occur within 24 hours of the current period ending, and the duration will be the same as the current one. Any remaining time on your free trial will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.
Manage subscriptions and disable auto-renewal in your account settings.

Terms of Use: yandex.com/legal/music_termsofuse
Privacy policy: yandex.com/legal/confidential

Discover new music

Organize

And more

A First Music Player without interruptive ADS
Melodista is a player for music lovers. Optimized to match cutting edge iOS user experience, integrated with the latest system technologies.

A simple Playlist system ensures that you will be able to easily access your music and arrange them in a way you like. Collect all your music from your authorized sources in one app.
Melodista player is fast and efficient.

Top features:
- Create and organize folder playlists
- Import tracks from clouds and Files app
- Manage, copy, move, rename and transfer files
- Supports many audio formats
- Edit Song Picture and name
- Share with friends 
- Use sleep timer at night
- Dark Mode 
- All popular player controls
- Player gets updated every two weeks with new features 

- Designed for iOS users, full iOS 13 and iPhone support

Pro Account Subscription:
- $1.49 per month for US. Prices in US dollars, may vary in countries other than U.S.and are subject to change without notice.
Payment for Melodista offline player Pro Account subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account at the time of purchase. Your subscription will be automatically renewed monthly. Canceling the trial period will immediately disable your subscription. Payment for subscription renewals will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can disable subscription renewal in your iTunes account settings on your device. By tapping "Start Trial" or "Buy Now" you confirm that you have read the Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy and agree to be bound by their terms.

Best FREE music player, video player, and downloader. Smart online music player. ALL FREE!

The most feature-rich music player with unique features: nearby music recognition, movies, picture in picture, AI recommendations, and much more. Enjoy music with a stunning dark theme.

Hundreds of millions of users choose our music apps! it’s a top 10 music app in over 100 countries. Join our 200M+ music family - download now!

Stream online music or movies to save device space!

Download over 30 million MP3 songs fast and play offline music anytime with equalizer, lyrics, bass boost, themes. Listen to offline music & video, podcasts, FM Radio, even when the screen is off.

Watch unlimited free movies & TV shows of any genre: Comedy, Action, Fantasy, Adventure, Horror, and more in any language!

The application provides streaming for non-commercial use only. All music content is legal. Note: This app is not a YouTube music downloader. YouTube music can be streamed but not downloaded.

• Unlimited free music for unlimited time! All the app features are free forever!  No limited skips, no accounts/subscriptions needed, no purchases at all!

• Find any song! Stream over 300 million free songs from YouTube.

• Picture in picture mode for multitasking: floating popup player with an ability to change the size and many other options.

• Listen to other users' playlists or import your own playlists from YouTube.

• Smart search: search any songs, artists, albums, artists, singles, covers, remixes, and more.

• Powerful 10 band equalizer with presets - enjoy your music in your way!

• Variable speed playback and BlueTooth headset controls.

• Battery saver with reduced brightness and taps protection.

• Music playing nearby recognition - discover new tracks on the go! Tap the mic button, and the app will identify music playing nearby and build playlists with similar songs.

• Unlimited free movies & TV shows. Tens of thousands of movies of any genre: Comedy, Action, Fantasy, Adventure, Horror, and more in any language!

• YouTube playlists import.

• All music player controls: repeats, shuffle, and more.

• Intelligent recommendations for featured music.

• Daily updated top charts and trending music playlists.

• Non-stop playback station mode based on smart AI recommendations.

• Create and manage your favorite playlists with any content: online, podcasts, etc.

• Share your music and playlists with your friends!

• Tons of different genres, moods, and other music categories: Hip-Hop, Reggaeton, Pop, Rock, Classical, Jazz, RnB, Urban, Dubstep, Drum, Electronic, etc.

• Rich audio and video lossless music format support: FLAC, ALAC, OPUS, MP3, AAC, OGG, M4A, WAV, AIFF, M4R, WMA, MP4, MKV, and many others.

• Import files over Wi-Fi and from the Files app

• Cast to TV and other devices.

• Sleep timer: fall asleep to your favorite music. Start your music, and then set the countdown timer. At the end of the countdown, the app softly stops your music.

• Ad-Free option.

Note: the app does not download YouTube videos and does not play YouTube in the background; use of the app is subject to your agreement with our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service: https://www.atplayer.com/privacy-policy.html

This app is the best source of unlimited music. The app has over 300 million online music tracks for streaming and over 30 million high-quality MP3 songs for download. ALL FREE!

Play piano easily with fun. Without any experience, learn your favorite songs faster than ever! 

Choose a way to discover the piano universe which suits you the best.

A new unique approach to learning piano:
Skip theory and dive into practice.
Learn by memory by watching & repeating piano songs. Train your musical hearing by tapping on the right notes. You will be surprised by your memory!
Learn at your own pace, whenever and wherever you want.

A rhythm game to play piano like a maestro:
Play famous hits and classic songs easily thanks to an ultra-realistic piano with HD sound!
Challenge yourself and increase your skills with hundreds of levels created by professional musicians. Improve your sense of rhythm and try to get all notes perfectly.
Finish all the levels and be part of an entire orchestra thanks to an incredible concert mode.

Play your favorite songs:
Our catalog is updated with new content every week!
Worldwide popular hits like Shape of You By Ed Sheeran, Chandelier by Sia, Faded by Alan Walker…
All-time classic songs like Mozart, Beethoven, Bach…

Unleash you creativity:
Play piano freely on a keyboard simulator, where you can play any song and chord.
Our digital Piano app lets you choose sounds from a number of musical instruments: from a piano keyboard and grand piano to the harpsichord and organ.

Main features:
- 2 gameplay: Learn mode and game mode
- Ultra-realistic piano keyboard
- Levels to improve your rhythm skills
- An immersive experience in an orchestra by playing piano in a concert mode
- Various music songs: Famous songs, Most classics tracks, Folklore songs
- A catalog updated every week
- 5 different keyboards and musical instruments: Grand Piano, Vintage Piano, Electric Piano, Church Organ, Harpsichord
- Metronome & Time signature

Premium benefits:
The premium subscription allows you to access all the present and upcoming Premium features such as the different piano types. It gives you access to all the premium and regularly updated piano songs. You will also have an ad-free experience.

Have any questions or suggestions regarding the app? Our support team is ready to help at [support-piano@mwmapps.com](mailto:support-piano@mwmapps.com).

Privacy Policy & Terms of Service: https://musicworldmedia.com/products/piano-keyboard/tos

GuitarTuna is your go-to guitar app, with over 100 million downloads and counting! Tune your guitar in seconds with the free guitar tuner, explore guitar chords & tabs for 20,000+ songs, and learn how to play guitar songs you love with trainers, tutorials & personalized feedback.

Why you’ll love Guitartuna
• Tune any guitar, ukulele, violin or bass perfectly with easy-to-use tuning
• Switch seamlessly between guitar tuner, ukulele tuner, bass tuner & more
• Get guitar tabs & chords for your favorite songs
• Learn guitar songs with trainers, tutorials & personalized feedback
• Practice like a pro with essential tools for guitar
• Play songs you love at any skill level – guitar beginners included!
• Become a better guitar player with an all-in-one guitar app in your pocket

How it works
• Just pluck a string on your instrument and GuitarTuna detects the sound using your device’s microphone.
• You’ll get instant visual feedback while tuning. No cables needed.
• With our audio recognition technology, you’ll get insanely accurate tuning. Noise cancellation technology eliminates background noises while you tune.

Learn songs with guitar tutorials
• Learn guitar songs with video tutorials & interactive trainers
• Get personalized feedback to improve your guitar playing
• Create your own personalized learning path
• Get tips from expert guitarists

Play songs with guitar tabs & chords
• Explore guitar tabs for 20,000+ popular songs by top global artists
• Get pro-quality guitar chords & guitar tabs
• Choose guitar tabs & chords for your skill level
• Play at your own pace while chords & tabs sync with you
• Request guitar tabs & chords for your favorite songs
• New guitar songs & tabs added weekly!

Tools to practice guitar like a pro
• Metronome: Set your tempo & customize your time signature with the metronome tool
• Chord games: G chord giving you trouble? Learn, practice & master guitar chords with customizable games.
• Ear trainer: Improve your music skills & recognize chords by ear
• Chord library: Explore guitar chords with diagrams & audio
• Left-hand mode: Easily switch between right & left hand modes

Instruments
• Guitar
• Guitar 7-String
• Guitar 12-String
• Ukulele
• Cavaquinho
• Bass
• Bass 5-string
• Violin
• Viola
• Cello
• Fiddle
• Mandolin
• Balalaika
• Banjo
• Banjo 5-String

We’ve put a lot of love and effort into making GuitarTuna the tuner it is today. Your feedback is valuable to us, and you can be sure we’re listening. We recently added pro-quality guitar song chords and lyrics to the app because of the sheer amount of requests for them. Play your favorite songs anywhere, anytime, with our entire song library produced by professional musicians.

GuitarTuna Pro subscription: Subscribe for unlimited access. Subscriptions are monthly. Prices may vary in different countries. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s iTunes Account Settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

GuitarTuna is developed by Yousician. Check out Yousician’s apps to learn and master guitar, ukulele, bass, piano or singing!

It’s pretty cool you actually read this far! Here’s a joke for you: What’s the difference between a bass and a tuna? You can tuna bass, but you can’t bass a tuna!

Now download the app and see how it is.
Send us your feedback on the joke and the app to support@guitartuna.com!

Save space on your device and have access to all of your music stored in Google Drive, DropBox, and OneDrive.

Download all your music to your device to play it without the internet (Offline mode).

Import your music from WiFi transfer (PC/Mac), iTunes file sharing and Files.

Lark Player is a stylish and free offline music player and video player for iPhone. It supports to play all major formats of offline music and videos. This free music player has a powerful playlist and the best user interface. It also supports file import on the device, such as Album and Files. Even import your music files via Wifi and cloud drive. Currently, more than 100 million users worldwide use Lark Player to play music offline.

Audio Player and Video Player Support to All popular formats
Not only an MP3 player, it supported audio formats including: MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, M4A, ACC ,etc.
Not only an audio player, it is also a video player. With this media player you can play video that formats of MP4, 3GP, MOV, MKV, etc.

Easily Manage Your Files
You can browse your offline music by song, artist, album, genre, and more with this free offline music player. It also supports to create and manage music playlists.

More Free Features:
Offline music player, songs player, audio player, mp3 player with high quality music experience.
Audio player support audio formats like MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, M4A, ACC ,etc.
Video player support to video formats like MP4, 3GP, MKV, etc.
Save your favorite songs and play them in offline music player without wifi.
Play song in shuffle, order or loop with the MP3 player.
Play music in background and notification bar with the MP3 player.
Browse and play music by albums, artists, music playlists, genres, etc.

If you have any audio files or video files, just play it with Lark Player

Note: Lark Player is an offline music player and offline video player. It’s not a music downloader and it doesn't support music download.
